title: NHL suspends regular season due to coronavirus concerns - Sportsnet.ca

content: The NHL has suspended the season due to the COVID pandemic League commissioner Gary Bettman made the announcement in a statement Thursday afternoon following a conference call with the board of governors The move to pause the NHL schedule c chars
